name: eqvreltrd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

stmt.origin: mp2and(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, c1, c3), wbr(c3, c1, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c3))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c3, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c3), wbr(c3, c1, c2)), wbr(c0, c1, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c3))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c3, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c3), wbr(c3, c1, c2)), wbr(c0, c1, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c3), wbr(c3, c1, c2)), wbr(c0, c1, c2)))
-| wi(w0, weqvrel(c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c3))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c3, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, weqvrel(c1))

comment: A transitivity relation for equivalences. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2014.) (Revised by Peter Mazsa, 2-Jun-2019.)
